attributes.action: Compensate university students for strike-missed lectures with partial refunds.
attributes.additional_details: Ensuring students receive compensation for missed lectures due to university strikes is crucial as it upholds the value of their financial investment in their education and gives them assurance that they are receiving the full learning experience they are paying for. Attending university has become expensive.
attributes.background: Compensate universities students for their missed lectures due to strikes by offering partial refunds, as the students are paying for a learning experience and not receiving it in full.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628976
